resources.string: Welcome to BREON Lone Worker Safety App. This app collects location data to enable asset safety monitoring of its user: Sign on, Checkin, Tracking, SOS, Assist, Hazard and Sign off even when the app is in background. Please Sign out to stop location capture. If selected to be used, Tracking requires location capture when app is in background.
Welcome to BREON Lone Worker Safety App. Please note, you need to be connected to the Internet to complete login and you will stay logged in until you logoff.
If you have questions please contact BREON Telematics at support@breontelematics.com.au
Password must be 6 letter or more.
YOU NEED TO SIGN ON BEFORE WE CAN START MONITORING. \n WHEN YOU CLICK ON THE SIGN ON BUTTON YOUR DASHBOARD CONTROLS WILL BE AVAILABLE UNTIL YOU SIGN OFF.
WHEN YOU SIGN OFF ALL ASSET MONITORING WILL STOP. \n TO VIEW YOUR DASHBOARD YOU WILL NEED TO SIGNON AGAIN. HOWEVER, YOUR LOCATION WILL BE TRACKED FOR SAFETY MONITORING.
Please sign on before accessing the dashboard
You can\'t change your settings while you are signed on, please sign off to view or change your current settings.
If you need Non Emergency Assistance it can be requested here.
Enter an optional note to communicate your situation below and press \'REQUEST ASSISTANCE\'. Our Safety Monitoring Center will contact you to assist.
HAZARD Monitoring can be requested here.
IMPORTANT: A Hazard Monitoring duration that times out becomes an SOS event and Emergency Services will be deployed.
Time remaining to cancel this hazard timer
An SOS can be sent here.
Emergency Services will deployed and Safety Monitoring Operations will contact you.
(1) Enter an optional note to communicate your situation below and press \'SOS\' button.
(2) Please Cancel if SOS no longer needed.
Please checkin by %s to avoid safety event
Time remaining until next check in
MOBILE Test Template 20 minutes checkin 1 hour
Copyright Â© BREON Telematics 2021. All rights reserved.
Are you sure you want to log off ?
Location permission is needed for safety monitoring. Please give location permission.
BREON is currently tracking your location.
BREON is currently monitoring your device.
Please allow location service for safety monitoring purpose.
Location details are utilized to accurately determine the location of the last Sign-In, Hazard report, or SOS alert for enhance user safety and operational efficiency.
Please allow notification permission to function app properly.
Current Asset State is Off Duty, please sign off.
Current asset state is Off Duty, so you can\'t SignOn until the state change.
Instructions provided to the BT Operations :

A permanent electronic record of this form has been stored at:
Tick the SWMS reviewed for this activity:
Do I have access, knowledge & confidence?
Have you identified new or changed hazards?
please specify hazards and safety controls to address them

string-array.name: step_one_questions
string-array.item: Do I have access, knowledge & confidence?
Do I have the mandatory PPE?
Do I know how I may be injured?
Do I understand the risks of the job?

string-array.name: step_two_questions
string-array.item: Do I still feel unsure about the unusual circumstances?
Do I understand the necessary additional controls?
Do I understand the significance of the hazard?
Have I checked all available resources?

string-array.name: actions_array
string-array.item: Continue field work as planned OR
Update safety controls and continue fieldwork OR
